jobDescription: Job Title: Data Analyst PYTHON - San Francisco, CA Job Description: This role is to analyses performance data specific to enterprise server infrastructure. Required strong analytical skills, Python scripting experience with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy.  Successful candidate will perform data analysis of large reports (200K+ rows/125 columns) to identify trends & detect problems. Title: Data Analyst PYTHONLocation: San Francisco Required Experience: Excel advanced user - fluency with pivot tables & formulasFamiliarity with SDLC, Version Control, & Change Management processesMastery of SQL group by queriesSkilled in Python -- intermediate/advanced PythonSelf-starter; ability to work with minimal supervision Nice to haves: Familiarity with various programs and applications commonly found in enterprise server infrastructure, their functions, and lifecycle - for example: Java, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Visual C++, Red Hat Enterprise Linux, Veritas NetBackup, WebLogic, Websphere, Apache HTTP Server, Adobe Flash, Google ChromeFamiliarity with Qualys Vulnerability Management is nice to haveAdditional Details:Job ID:324514Dept ID:10600Location: San Francisco, CA  United States of America Industry: Online / Full App Job Type: Temp Position Folder Group ID 258 Posted Date:6/11/2018 Domain:arna  Contact: [Click Here to Email Your Resumé]
